mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.cid AS "platformCategory.id", pc.name AS "platformCategory.name", a.cname AS "cname", a.name AS "name", a.platform AS "platform", a.category_id AS "category.id", c.name AS "category.name", a.measure_id AS "measure.id", m.name AS "measure.name", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", uu.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_3rd_category pc ON pc.id = a.cid LEFT JOIN mod_item_category c ON c.id = a.category_id LEFT JOIN mod_measure m ON m.id = a.measure_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_3rd_property( id, cid, cname, name, platform, category_id, measure_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{platformCategory.id}, #{cname}, #{name}, #{platform}, #{category.id}, #{measure.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mod_3rd_property SET cid = #{platformCategory.id}, cname = #{platformCategory.name}, name = #{name}, platform = #{platform}, category_id = #{category.id}, measure_id = #{measure.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
